description: MongoDB ek popular NoSQL database hai jo flexible documents me data store karta hai, scalability aur fast performance ke saath.

topics.title: NoSQL Basics & MongoDB Introduction
topics.english: Understanding NoSQL databases and how MongoDB differs from traditional SQL databases.
topics.hinglish: NoSQL databases samajhna aur MongoDB SQL databases se kaise different hai.
examples: SQL: SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25

practice.question: What is the main advantage of NoSQL over SQL?
practice.answer: Flexible schema, horizontal scalability, and better performance for unstructured data

practice.question: MongoDB me data kaise store hota hai?
practice.answer: Documents me (JSON-like format), tables me nahi

topics.title: MongoDB Installation & Setup
topics.english: Installing MongoDB locally and setting up the environment.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB ko apne computer pe install karna aur environment setup karna.

practice.question: How to check if MongoDB is running?
practice.answer: Run 'mongod' command or check service status

practice.question: MongoDB start karne ke liye konsa command use karte hain?
practice.answer: mongod --dbpath [your-data-path]

topics.title: MongoDB Atlas & Cloud Setup
topics.english: Setting up MongoDB in the cloud using MongoDB Atlas.
topics.hinglish: Cloud me MongoDB setup karna MongoDB Atlas use karke.

practice.question: What is MongoDB Atlas?
practice.answer: Fully managed MongoDB cloud service by MongoDB Inc.

practice.question: Atlas ka main advantage kya hai?
practice.answer: No installation required, automatic backups, scaling easy hai

topics.title: MongoDB Compass GUI
topics.english: Using MongoDB Compass graphical interface to interact with databases.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB Compass GUI use karna databases ke saath interact karne ke liye.

practice.question: What can you do with MongoDB Compass?
practice.answer: Visually explore data, run queries, optimize performance, and manage indexes

practice.question: Compass me query kaise run karte hain?
practice.answer: Filter box me query likhkar Enter press karte hain

topics.title: Databases, Collections & Documents
topics.english: Understanding MongoDB's hierarchy: Database → Collections → Documents.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB ka structure samajhna: Database → Collections → Documents.

practice.question: How to switch to a database in MongoDB?
practice.answer: use database_name

practice.question: Collection automatically kaise create hoti hai?
practice.answer: Jab pehli baar usme document insert karte hain

detailed_explanation.example_code:
use ecommerce
db.products.insertOne({ name: 'Laptop', price: 999, category: 'Electronics' })

components.name: Database
components.tip: Database physically exists when first collection is created

components.name: Collection
components.tip: No fixed schema - different documents can have different fields

components.name: Document
components.tip: Similar to JSON but supports more data types

topics.title: BSON Data Types
topics.english: Understanding BSON (Binary JSON) data types used by MongoDB.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB jo BSON data types use karta hai unhe samajhna.

practice.question: What is BSON?
practice.answer: Binary JSON - extends JSON with additional data types like Date, Binary, ObjectId

practice.question: MongoDB internally konsa format use karta hai?
practice.answer: BSON (Binary JSON), JSON nahi

components.name: ObjectId
components.tip: Contains timestamp, machine ID, process ID, and counter

components.name: Date
components.hinglish: Date aur time store karta hai
components.tip: Always store dates as ISODate, not strings

components.name: Number Types
components.tip: Use Decimal for financial data to avoid floating-point errors

topics.title: CRUD Operations - Create
topics.english: Creating documents using insert operations.
topics.hinglish: Insert operations use karke documents create karna.

practice.question: Difference between insertOne and insertMany?
practice.answer: insertOne inserts single document, insertMany inserts multiple documents in one operation

practice.question: insertMany me error aaye toh kya hota hai?
practice.answer: ordered: true (default) - stop at first error; ordered: false - continue inserting others

topics.title: CRUD Operations - Read (Find)
topics.english: Reading documents using find operations with queries.
topics.hinglish: Find operations aur queries use karke documents read karna.

practice.question: How to format output for better readability?
practice.answer: Use .pretty() method: db.collection.find().pretty()

practice.question: find() aur findOne() me difference?
practice.answer: find() returns cursor (multiple docs), findOne() returns single document object

topics.title: CRUD Operations - Update
topics.english: Updating documents using update operations.
topics.hinglish: Update operations use karke documents modify karna.

practice.question: What's the difference between updateOne and replaceOne?
practice.answer: updateOne modifies specific fields, replaceOne replaces the entire document

practice.question: $set operator kya karta hai?
practice.answer: Specific fields update karta hai, baaki fields ko chhod deta hai

topics.title: CRUD Operations - Delete
topics.english: Deleting documents using delete operations.
topics.hinglish: Delete operations use karke documents remove karna.

practice.question: How to delete all documents from a collection?
practice.answer: db.collection.deleteMany({}) - empty filter matches all documents

practice.question: Collection delete karne ke liye kya command hai?
practice.answer: db.collection.drop() - puri collection delete ho jati hai

topics.title: Query Operators
topics.english: Using comparison and logical operators for advanced queries.
topics.hinglish: Advanced queries ke liye comparison aur logical operators use karna.
examples: db.users.find({ age: { $gte: 25 } }) // Greater than or equal
db.users.find({ age: { $lte: 25 } }) // Less than or equal

practice.question: How to find users aged 25 or older?
practice.answer: db.users.find({ age: { $gte: 25 } })

practice.question: $in operator kab use karte hain?
practice.answer: Jab multiple values me se kisi ek se match karna ho

topics.title: Projections & Field Selection
topics.english: Selecting specific fields to return in query results.
topics.hinglish: Query results me specific fields select karna return karne ke liye.
examples: // _id is included by default, exclude it

practice.question: How to exclude _id field from results?
practice.answer: db.collection.find({}, { _id: 0, field1: 1 })

practice.question: 0 aur 1 projection me kya matlab hai?
practice.answer: 1: field include karo, 0: field exclude karo

topics.title: Sorting & Pagination
topics.english: Sorting results and implementing pagination with limit and skip.
topics.hinglish: Results ko sort karna aur limit/skip use karke pagination implement karna.

practice.question: How to get the newest documents first?
practice.answer: db.collection.find().sort({ created_at: -1 })

practice.question: Pagination me skip() ka kya drawback hai?
practice.answer: Large skips slow hote hain kyunki server sab documents count karta hai

topics.title: Cursors & Iteration
topics.english: Understanding and working with MongoDB cursors.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB cursors ko samajhna aur unke saath kaam karna.

practice.question: What is a cursor in MongoDB?
practice.answer: A pointer to the result set of a query, allows iteration over results

practice.question: Cursor directly print kyu nahi karte?
practice.answer: Cursor lazy evaluation use karta hai, data fetch-on-demand hota hai

topics.title: Data Modeling - Embedding vs Referencing
topics.english: Choosing between embedded documents and document references for data modeling.
topics.hinglish: Data modeling ke liye embedded documents aur document references me se choose karna.

practice.question: When to use embedding?
practice.answer: When data has one-to-few relationship, needs to be read together frequently

practice.question: Referencing kab better hai?
practice.answer: Jab data frequently update hota hai, ya one-to-many/many-to-many relationship ho

components.name: Embedding
components.english: Nesting related data in single document
components.hinglish: Related data ko single document me nest karna
components.pros: Single read/write, data consistency, fast queries

components.name: Referencing
components.hinglish: Related documents ke references store karna
components.pros: Flexible, no size limits, normalized data

topics.title: Schema Validation
topics.english: Enforcing data structure and validation rules on collections.
topics.hinglish: Collections pe data structure aur validation rules enforce karna.

practice.question: What does validationLevel: 'moderate' mean?
practice.answer: Applies validation to new updates and inserts, but not to existing invalid documents

practice.question: validationAction 'warn' aur 'error' me difference?
practice.answer: 'warn': log warning but allow operation; 'error': reject invalid operation

topics.title: Indexes - Single Field
topics.english: Creating and using single-field indexes for query optimization.
topics.hinglish: Query optimization ke liye single-field indexes create aur use karna.
examples: // Sparse index (only indexes documents with the field)

practice.question: When is a sparse index useful?
practice.answer: When many documents don't have the indexed field, saves storage space

practice.question: Unique index duplicate values ko kya karta hai?
practice.answer: Reject karta hai, error throw karta hai

components.name: Index Creation
components.english: Creating B-tree structure for fast lookups
components.hinglish: Fast lookups ke liye B-tree structure banana
components.tip: Indexes trade write speed for read speed

components.name: Index Types
components.hinglish: 1 ascending ke liye, -1 descending ke liye
components.tip: For equality queries, order doesn't matter

topics.title: Indexes - Compound
topics.english: Creating multi-field indexes for complex query patterns.
topics.hinglish: Complex query patterns ke liye multi-field indexes create karna.
examples: // Query that uses compound index efficiently

practice.question: What is the index prefix principle?
practice.answer: Compound index supports queries on any prefix of its fields

practice.question: Compound index {a:1, b:1, c:1} konsi queries support karega?
practice.answer: a; a,b; a,b,c - but NOT b,c alone

topics.title: Indexes - Text Search
topics.english: Creating text indexes for full-text search capabilities.
topics.hinglish: Full-text search ke liye text indexes create karna.
examples: // Text search with projection and sort by score

practice.question: What types of fields can be included in a text index?
practice.answer: String or array of string fields only

practice.question: Text index me weights ka kya kaam hai?
practice.answer: Different fields ko different importance deta hai scoring me

topics.title: Indexes - Geospatial
topics.english: Creating geospatial indexes for location-based queries.
topics.hinglish: Location-based queries ke liye geospatial indexes create karna.

practice.question: What's the correct order for coordinates in GeoJSON?
practice.answer: [longitude, latitude] - NOT [latitude, longitude]

practice.question: 2dsphere aur 2d index me difference?
practice.answer: 2dsphere spherical calculations ke liye, 2d flat surface ke liye

topics.title: Aggregation Pipeline - $match & $group
topics.english: Using $match to filter documents and $group to group documents for aggregation.
topics.hinglish: $match use karke documents filter karna aur $group se documents ko group karna aggregation ke liye.

practice.question: What's the difference between $match and find()?
practice.answer: $match is used within aggregation pipeline, find() is a standalone query method

practice.question: $group me _id field ka kya significance hai?
practice.answer: _id determines grouping key - yahi field ke basis par documents group hote hain

aggregation_operators.hinglish: Unique values ka array create karna

topics.title: Aggregation Pipeline - $sort & $lookup
topics.english: Sorting results in pipeline and performing joins between collections using $lookup.
topics.hinglish: Pipeline me results sort karna aur $lookup use karke collections ke beech joins perform karna.
examples: { $sort: { price: -1, rating: -1 } }, // Sort by price then rating
// $lookup for joining collections (similar to SQL JOIN)

practice.question: When to use $unwind with $lookup?
practice.answer: When you want to work with the joined document as an object instead of array

practice.question: $lookup performance considerations?
practice.answer: $lookup can be expensive; ensure foreignField is indexed

topics.title: Transactions & ACID Compliance
topics.english: Using multi-document transactions for atomic operations across collections.
topics.hinglish: Multiple collections ke across atomic operations ke liye multi-document transactions use karna.

practice.question: When should you use transactions in MongoDB?
practice.answer: When you need atomic operations across multiple documents or collections

practice.question: Transactions performance impact?
practice.answer: Transactions add overhead; use only when necessary for data consistency

acid_properties.english: All operations succeed or all fail
acid_properties.hinglish: Sab operations succeed ya sab fail
acid_properties.example: Bank transfer - debit and credit must both complete

acid_properties.hinglish: Transaction ke baad data valid rahe

transaction_limits: All collections must be in same replica set or shard
Operations must be on existing collections

topics.title: Change Streams & Real-time Data
topics.english: Monitoring real-time changes to collections using change streams.
topics.hinglish: Change streams use karke collections me real-time changes monitor karna.
examples: // Open change stream on a collection
// Process: send notification, update cache, etc.

practice.question: What are typical use cases for change streams?
practice.answer: Real-time notifications, cache invalidation, data synchronization, audit logging

practice.question: Change streams replica set requirement?
practice.answer: Replica set ya sharded cluster required, standalone MongoDB me nahi chalta

topics.title: Database Triggers
topics.english: Creating serverless functions triggered by database events.
topics.hinglish: Database events se trigger hone wale serverless functions create karna.
examples: // Example: Send welcome email for new user
// If status updated to 'shipped', update user's order count

practice.question: What's the difference between change streams and triggers?
practice.answer: Change streams are low-level API, triggers are managed functions in Atlas

practice.question: Atlas triggers billing consideration?
practice.answer: Triggers consume compute time; monitor usage for cost control

topics.title: Database Administration - Backups
topics.english: Implementing backup strategies and disaster recovery plans.
topics.hinglish: Backup strategies aur disaster recovery plans implement karna.

practice.question: What's the 3-2-1 backup rule?
practice.answer: 3 copies of data, 2 different media types, 1 copy offsite

practice.question: mongodump vs filesystem snapshot?
practice.answer: mongodump logical backup, filesystem snapshot physical backup (faster for large DB)

topics.title: Performance Tuning - Explain & Profiling
topics.english: Analyzing query performance using explain() and database profiler.
topics.hinglish: explain() aur database profiler use karke query performance analyze karna.

practice.question: What does 'IXSCAN' in explain output mean?
practice.answer: Index scan - query is using an index (good)

practice.question: Profiler level 0, 1, 2 difference?
practice.answer: 0=off, 1=log slow ops, 2=log all ops

explain_output_sections.purpose: Shows winning plan and rejected plans

topics.title: Sharding & Horizontal Scaling
topics.english: Distributing data across multiple servers using sharding.
topics.hinglish: Sharding use karke data ko multiple servers par distribute karna.
examples: // Shard with hashed key (for even distribution)

practice.question: What is a good shard key?
practice.answer: High cardinality, supports query patterns, distributes writes evenly

practice.question: Shard key change possible?
practice.answer: No, shard key cannot be changed after sharding - choose carefully!

sharding_components.hinglish: Data ka subset store karta hai
sharding_components.tip: Each shard is a replica set
Stores chunk mappings and shard info

sharding_components.hinglish: Query router ka kaam karta hai
sharding_components.tip: Clients connect to mongos, not directly to shards

topics.title: Replica Sets & High Availability
topics.english: Creating replica sets for data redundancy and high availability.
topics.hinglish: Data redundancy aur high availability ke liye replica sets create karna.
examples: cfg.members[0].priority = 2 // Make this member more likely to become primary
cfg.members[1].hidden = true // Hide from clients (for reporting)

practice.question: Minimum members for replica set?
practice.answer: 3 members recommended (or 2 members + 1 arbiter)

practice.question: Arbiter ka role?
practice.answer: Voting ke liye (no data storage), tie break situations me help karta hai

replica_set_roles.tip: Only one primary at a time

replica_set_roles.hinglish: Data replicate karta hai, reads handle kar sakta hai
replica_set_roles.tip: Can be configured for specific purposes (hidden, delayed)

replica_set_roles.hinglish: Sirf elections me vote deta hai
replica_set_roles.tip: No data storage, minimal resource usage

failover_scenarios: Primary fails → automatic election → new primary
Network partition → majority elects new primary

topics.title: Security - Authentication & Encryption
topics.english: Implementing authentication, authorization, and data encryption.
topics.hinglish: Authentication, authorization aur data encryption implement karna.
examples: // Create application user with specific privileges
// read, readWrite, dbAdmin, userAdmin, clusterAdmin, backup, restore

practice.question: Difference between authentication and authorization?
practice.answer: Authentication verifies identity, authorization checks permissions

practice.question: TLS at-rest encryption vs in-transit?
practice.answer: At-rest: data on disk encrypted; In-transit: network traffic encrypted

topics.title: Node.js Integration with Mongoose
topics.english: Connecting Node.js applications to MongoDB using Mongoose ODM.
topics.hinglish: Mongoose ODM use karke Node.js applications ko MongoDB se connect karna.

practice.question: What is Mongoose ODM?
practice.answer: Object Data Modeling library for MongoDB and Node.js, provides schema validation

practice.question: Mongoose schema vs MongoDB schema?
practice.answer: Mongoose enforces schema at application level, MongoDB is schema-less

topics.title: Python Integration with PyMongo
topics.english: Connecting Python applications to MongoDB using PyMongo driver.
topics.hinglish: PyMongo driver use karke Python applications ko MongoDB se connect karna.

practice.question: PyMongo vs MongoEngine?
practice.answer: PyMongo is low-level driver, MongoEngine is ODM (like Mongoose for Python)

practice.question: How to handle connection errors in PyMongo?
practice.answer: Use try-except blocks, implement retry logic with exponential backoff

topics.title: MERN Stack Integration
topics.english: Building full-stack applications with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB, Express, React, aur Node.js ke saath full-stack applications build karna.
examples: const user = await User.create({ name, email, password });
setFormData({ name: '', email: '', password: '' }); // Reset form
// 3. Add MongoDB Atlas connection string to Heroku config vars

practice.question: What are the key components of MERN stack?
practice.answer: MongoDB (database), Express (backend framework), React (frontend library), Node.js (runtime)

practice.question: How to handle CORS in MERN stack?
practice.answer: Use cors middleware in Express: app.use(cors())

topics.title: Project: E-commerce Backend
topics.english: Building a complete e-commerce backend with MongoDB.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB ke saath complete e-commerce backend build karna.
examples: // Update stock when order is placed

practice.question: How to handle concurrent inventory updates?
practice.answer: Use transactions or optimistic concurrency control with version numbers

practice.question: E-commerce me indexing strategy?
practice.answer: Index on: product category, price, created_at; text index on name and description

topics.title: Deployment on MongoDB Atlas
topics.english: Deploying MongoDB applications to production using MongoDB Atlas.
topics.hinglish: MongoDB Atlas use karke MongoDB applications ko production me deploy karna.
examples: //    Sign up for free tier (512MB storage)
//    - Choose M0 Sandbox (Free tier) for development
//    - Privileges: Read and write to any database
//    - For production: Add 0.0.0.0/0 (all IPs) OR specific server IPs

practice.question: What's the difference between M0, M10, M20 tiers?
practice.answer: M0: Free sandbox; M10: Shared RAM, dedicated CPU; M20: Dedicated RAM/CPU, replica set

practice.question: How to reduce Atlas costs?
practice.answer: Use appropriate tier, enable auto-pause, clean up old data, optimize queries
